Hello All, 
I'm new with Maven, and I have developed Unit tests of a 
java =
application. 
I want to run all the Junit tests in one time using Maven and=
 to generate a html report containing the summary of all the tested methods=
 ? 
Could someone tell me how to do that (especially the junit html report =
generation) ? 
  I used the command > mvn site but it generates the Maven s=
ite without the Junit report!
  Can you help!
Thank you in advance 
Best re=
gards 
Riadh MNASRI
